author: TravisEz13
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

Add ability to pass `PSBuildParameters` into the class and script you supply to `https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.management.automation.argumentcompleterattribute?view=powershellsdk-1.1.0`


# Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

This would allow argument completion where it is not reasonably possible without knowing the value of other options.

The best example I can think of is the Azure VM Image parameters.

Location -> Publisher -> Offer -> SKUs -> Image

My the time you get to Offer, if you don't know Publisher and Location, the list is would take way to long to retrieve.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: This already exists for the described scenario

title: Add ability to create ArgumentCompleters which are dependant on other parameters
